alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 12:59PM MST until January 06 at 6:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Custer County Plains, the Pennington County Plains and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Occasional light snow may reduce visibility at times and produce slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains
